item.title: demo
item.description: 1.安装hugo脚手架 https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/ 1.1 Binary Install 1 2 3 4 5 # Homebrew (macOS) brew install hugo # 验证安装 hugo version 1.2 Advanced Install 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 mkdir $HOME/src cd $HOME/src git clone https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo.git cd hugo go install # 验证安装 hugo version 2.初始化站点 2.1 初始化blog 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 # 使用hugo创建新站点: blog hugo new site blog cd blog/ git init # 使用新的Hugo maupassant主题, 这款挺不错 git submodule add https://github.com/rujews/maupassant-hugo themes/maupassant 2.2
